entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reloading seems to mess up endpoint routing #41177
  • Resource indicators are missing in access token request #41176
  • Can't configure SSL certificate when TLS1.2 is enabled #41175
  • Quarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #41172
    Test failures
  • Kestrel ignores HostFilteringOptions on first run #41171
  • IIS: % in URL is double-unescaped #41168
    .NET 7 Planning
  • appsettings Urls takes precedence over ASPNETCORE_URLS in 6.0.4 #41167
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Call to builder.WebHost.UseUrls breaks Blazor Server app in VS17.1.4 #41165
  • AddDatabaseDeveloperPageExceptionFilter is added in all environments #41164
  • EditForm bindable validation state #41163
  • Client Certificate is discarded on TLS 1.3+IIS hosting #41162
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40957
  • [signalr-client-c++] Client does not send access_token for calls after negotiate. #41159
  • Multiple Authentication Schemes Validation chain behavior #41130
  • MetadataTypeAttribute (still) does NOT work for Blazor WASM (.NET 6) #41142
  • dotnet D:/d1/d2/...xx/web1.dll will cause Confusing webroot-path if the command-path is different with web1.dll real path #41103
  • Root level `.vsconfig` does not provide all the necessary prerequisites #41092

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Pass cancellation token to FlushAsync #41180
    area-signalr
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    5.0.x
  • Skip failing template tests in more places #41178
    area-mvc
  • Add TypedResults static factory class for creating typed IResult objects #41161
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • [release/6.0] Update baselines et cetera #41174
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Quarantine failing test #41173
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #41154
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.25
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #41156
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update `.vsconfig` to match Visual Studio install script config #41144
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime
  • Allow specifying authz policies on endpoints #41153
    area-security
  • Add `AddStackExchangeRedisCache` & `AddHsts` overload #40689
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix component government bugs #41160
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
